p: Moreover, other semi-thin sections were stained with auramine O for the presence of cutinized cell walls (Heslop-Harrison 1977) and examined by means of a Nikon Eclipse 90i equipped with fluorescein isothiocyanate filter (EXP. 465-495, DM 505; BA 515-555). Autofluorescence of chlorophyll in plastids was tested in fresh, hand-cut sections of nectary using a Nikon 90i fluorescence microscope with UV-2B filter. In each case, control sections were used.
